SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class GUIManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.common.UI
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.GUIManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class GUIManager extends UI
Class GUIManager controls the GUI class. When the server reports an event change, it triggers the changes to be made by the GUI class.
See Also:
  • UI
  • Application

    • setup

      public HashMap<String,javafx.scene.Scene> setup()
      Method setup creates all the stage phases which will be updated in other methods, their related controllers, then stores them using the correct hashmaps to link them with the fxml file and controller.
      Returns:
      nameMapScene (Type HashMapinvalid input: '<'String, Scene>)
